import {useRef, useState, useEffect} from 'react' import styles from './styles.module.css'; import GithubIcon from '../GithubIcon' import LinkedinIcon from '../LinkedinIcon' const Home = () => { const [click, setClick] = useState(null) const ref = useRef(null) useEffect(() => { if(click) { ref.current.scrollTo(500, 500) } setClick(false) }, [click]) const handleClick = () => { setClick(true) } return (
